subject: Hello Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Sir/Madam,
I only got your contact details from the South Africa Exchange Information On-line Service on my personal programmed search on the internet for a reputable company or individual to assist me sincerely & confidential which your information & profiles were very satisfactory, so I decided to contact you immediately.
It is my great pleasure to write you this letter. Within the Eskom Holdings Limited where I work as a Director of Audit and Project Implementation, I have in my possession an overdue payment in US funds.
The said funds represent a certain percentage of the total contract value executed on behalf of my Department by a foreign contracting firm, which, I the official over-invoiced to the amount of US$45,000, 000.00 (Forty Five Million United States Dollars). Though the actual contract cost has been paid to the original contractor leaving the excess balance unclaimed. Since the present elected Government is determined to pay foreign contractors all debts owed, so as to maintain a good relationship with foreign governments and non-government agencies, I included the bills for approvals with the Department of Finance and the South Africa Reserve Bank (SARB).
I am seeking your assistance to front as a beneficiary of the unclaimed funds since I am not allowed to operate foreign accounts, details, and change of beneficiary information upon application for claim to reflect payment and approvals will be secured on behalf of you/your Company. I have to propose that should you be willing to assist me in this transaction your share as compensation will be (35%), and the balance of (65%) will be for me. The business is completely safe and secure, provided you treat it with the utmost confidentiality. It does not matter whether you/your Company does contract projects, as a transfer of powers will be secured in favor of you/your Company. Also, your area of specialization is not a hindrance to the successful execution of this transaction.
I have reposed my confidence in you and hope that you will not disappoint me.
For more informationâ€™s kindly direct reply to me immediately.
Thanks for your co-operation.
Kindest Regards,
Mr.Simone Kante.

subject: Re:   Hello Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Kante,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. It's quite an interesting proposal you have there. I'm curious, how did you find my contact information? And why did you choose me specifically for this task?

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with the workings of foreign contracts or the Eskom Holdings Limited. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what my role would be in this process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Clarence

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Thanks for your swift response.

I need your full cooperation in this transaction to ensure smooth
successful completion of the contract fund  transfer to your designated
bank account, I am giving assurance to you that this transaction is risk
free. All the  international funds transfer rules and regulations will be
strictly followed,so that when the  fund will be transferred  into your
bank account overseas, there will not be any question from all financial
regulatory agencies in and outside  your country regarding the
transaction,because every required document will be provided.
Kindly provide the following information to enable me to submit an
application of claim on your behalf, and to secure authorization approvals
from the Department of Justice here in South Africa / other financial
authorities  before the transfer of the fund into an oversea account which
you will furnish the paying bank   in due course .

(1)Your complete names

(2)Full address

(3)Mobile telephone
Kante.


>

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear that this process is risk-free and all the rules will be strictly followed. I'm also glad to know that every required document will be provided.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the contract fund transfer? What exactly does it entail? Also, could you tell me more about the Department of Justice in South Africa and their role in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Clarence

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Thanks for your swift response.

I need your full cooperation in this transaction to ensure smooth
successful completion of the contract fund  transfer to your designated
bank account, I am giving assurance to you that this transaction is risk
free. All the  international funds transfer rules and regulations will be
strictly followed,so that when the  fund will be transferred  into your
bank account overseas, there will not be any question from all financial
regulatory agencies in and outside  your country regarding the
transaction,because every required document will be provided.
Kindly provide the following information to enable me to submit an
application of claim on your behalf, and to secure authorization approvals
from the Department of Justice here in South Africa / other financial
authorities  before the transfer of the fund into an oversea account which
you will furnish the paying bank   in due course .

(1)Your complete names

(2)Full address

(3)Mobile telephone
Kante.

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
I don't know you. I only got your contact details from  Information On-line
Service on my personal programmed search on the internet for a reputable
company or individual to assist me sincerely & confidentially.
I get a Non-appearance affidavit from Department of Justice in South
Africa( Supreme Court ) which will empower you as the current beneficiary
of the funds when I receive your full name and address , an advocate will
assist me on that it is going to be among the approval documents I will
send to you before the paying bank will transfer the funds out of this
shore.

I only need your name to move the funds out of South Africa. The original
person that executed the contract in Eskom Holdings Limited where I'm
working currently as the head of auditing department is late and he is a
foreigner and I over-invoiced the amount that I want to transfer to his
name because he has done a huge contract severally but he died during Covid
19.
Keep all the information confidential and please provide your details
urgently if you are truly interested to enable me to submit an application
of claim on your behalf.

I'm a family man and an elderly man. I cannot involve myself in something
that will put you or I into trouble.

I will be waiting for your response.

Kindest regards,
Mr.Kante.

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's really interesting to hear about the process involved in this contract fund transfer. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions.

Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this works? For instance, what is the role of the Department of Justice in South Africa in this process? And why is it necessary to secure approvals from other financial institutions?

I'm also curious about the documents that will be provided. What kind of documents are these and what purpose do they serve?

Looking forward to hearing more about this fascinating process!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Clarence

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate circumstances surrounding the original contract executor. It must be a challenging time for everyone involved.

I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the process of obtaining an affidavit from the Department of Justice in South Africa Supreme Court? Also, what role would I play as the current beneficiary of these funds?

I appreciate your reassurances about not getting into trouble. As a simple person, it's important to me that everything is done legally and ethically.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Clarence

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear that this process is risk-free and all the necessary documents will be provided. I'm curious, though, could you explain a bit more about how the Department of Justice in South Africa is involved in this process? Also, what kind of approvals are we talking about here?

I'm sorry but I can't provide my personal information online due to security reasons. Is there any other way we can proceed with this without sharing such details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Clarence

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Bye, you are not serious.
Regards,
Mr.Kante.

subject: Re: Thanks for your swift response
body:
Hello there! I'm sorry if I gave you the impression that I'm not serious. I am genuinely interested in our conversation. Could you please elaborate on what we were discussing?

Best wishes,
Clarence
